column3: Verify that users can place a food order successfully
column4:
- Open a web browser 
- visit chowdeck.com 
- click on the store link ( the cart icon) or navigate to chowdeck.com/store 
- click on the profile icon 
- click on the sign in button 
- enter valid login credentials ( or sign up if not registered ) 
- click on a restaurant to show available food menu 
- click on a food item to select 
- click "add item to my order button" 
- choose payment method 
- input delivery address
- click on "place order button "
column5:
chowdeck.com 
chowdeck.com/store 
phone number : 08072456688 
restaurant : chicken republic
food item : express combo 
delivery address : acemall oluyole 
payment method : bank transfer
column6: The user should be directed to the payment page and when payment has been successfully made the user will receive a confirmation message  " order successfully placed "  with details for tracking the order
column7:
The system directed me to the payment page after clicking the " place order " page 
when payment was successfully made via bank transfer i got a confirmation message " order successful " 
" click here for tracking details "
